name: hyperapp-module-view
description: Use you module view as component today !
author: Swizz

scripts.bundle: rollup -n moduleView -f umd -i dist/module-view.js -g hyperapp:hyperapp -o dist/module-view.dist.js
scripts.minify: uglifyjs dist/module-view.dist.js -o dist/module-view.dist.js --mangle --compress warnings=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty -p relative --source-map dist/module-view.js.map
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.release: npm run build && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
